calculations.name: Bull Flattener Normal Shock
calculations.tableau_expression:
// Created by Antoine Des Aulniers Favreau on 10/17/2017

if [Risk Date # of Days]< 750 then -1   //Short End 
    else if [Risk Date # of Days]> 10950 then -5  // Long End 
        else 
        -1*(1-([Risk Date # of Days]-750) / (10950-750)) + -5*([Risk Date # of Days]-750)/(10950-750)

        END
    END
